songs.title: Esa Diva
songs.information: Melody is a Spanish singer. She represented Spain in the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 with the song 'Esa Diva'.

songs.title: ZORRA
songs.information: Nebulossa represented Spain in the Eurovision Song Contest 2024 with the song 'ZORRA'.

songs.title: Eaea
songs.information: Blanca Paloma represented Spain in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with the song 'Eaea'.

songs.title: SloMo
songs.information: Chanel represented Spain in the Eurovision Song Contest 2022 with the song 'SloMo', achieving a historic third place.

songs.title: Voy a quedarme
songs.information: Blas Cantó represented Spain in Eurovision 2021 with 'Voy a quedarme'.

songs.title: Universo
songs.information: Blas Cantó was set to represent Spain in Eurovision 2020 with 'Universo', but the contest was cancelled due to COVID-19.

songs.title: La Venda
songs.information: Miki Núñez represented Spain in Eurovision 2019 with 'La Venda'.

songs.title: Tu canción
songs.information: Alfred & Amaia represented Spain in Eurovision 2018 with 'Tu canción'.

songs.title: Do It for Your Lover
songs.information: Manel Navarro represented Spain in Eurovision 2017 with 'Do It for Your Lover'.

songs.title: Say Yay!
songs.information: Barei represented Spain in Eurovision 2016 with 'Say Yay!'.

songs.title: Amanecer
songs.information: Edurne represented Spain in Eurovision 2015 with 'Amanecer'.
